Subsection.Text: Subject to the provisions of this part, any international banking corporation may establish offices in this state for the purposes of:

Paragraph.Text: Engaging in data processing or recordkeeping activities; and
Negotiating, approving, or servicing loans or extensions of credit and investments.

Subsection.Text: An office established pursuant to the provisions of this section may not engage in any activity except those activities set forth in subsection (1).
